summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.1°C) and outside temperature (down 8.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

The past week and month had observable variation in dew point temperature (up 11.0°C), feels like temperature (up 13.6°C), outside temperature (up 12.7°C), and cloud levels (up 143 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and winds will be practically absent. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and the light is absent. Similar weather conditions should remain.
